Articles.Content: I'm trying to reserve a slot under my first post in my interplanetary ships report, but it keeps adding my edits to my first post instead. Please Help!
I think that's to avoid double posts - i guess it's not letting anyone double post anymore.

You shouldn't need more than a single post, really. The forum automatically merges consecutive posts to keep things tidy.

You can simply partition your original post instead and have it all in one place. If you need to link to specific parts of the post, you can use the Goto and Line BBCode tags, as outlined here: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/107828-Goto-Line-Basically-%29
Or you can click go advanced. This means it won't merge it.

You shouldn't need more than a single post, really. The forum automatically merges consecutive posts to keep things tidy.

This is the most clever thing I've heard in a LONG time. Every time I see double posters, mainly when it's a "You know there's an edit button right?" moment, I get twitchy.
